title: Stock market news live updates: S&P 500 rallies to close out January, but still logs worst month since March 2020 - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: S&P 500 rallies to close out January, but still logs worst month since March 2020  Yahoo Finance
description: Stocks gained Monday as traders shook off a months' worth of equity market volatility and looked ahead to another packed week of corporate earnings results and economic data.
